alert.note: Alert for Phillips; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 14 at 10:57PM CDT until June 15 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 370 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 4 AM CDT WEDNESDAY FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN KANSAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN NORTH CENTRAL KANSAS PHILLIPS SMITH IN NEBRASKA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 19 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL NEBRASKA MERRICK IN EAST CENTRAL NEBRASKA POLK YORK IN SOUTH CENTRAL NEBRASKA ADAMS BUFFALO CLAY DAWSON FILLMORE FRANKLIN FURNAS GOSPER HALL HAMILTON HARLAN KEARNEY NUCKOLLS PHELPS THAYER WEBSTER THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALMA, ARAPAHOE, AURORA, BEAVER CITY, BELLAIRE, BLADEN, BLUE HILL, BOSTWICK, CAMBRIDGE, CAMPBELL, CENTRAL CITY, CLAY CENTER, COZAD, DESHLER, EDGAR, ELWOOD, EXETER, FAIRFIELD, FAIRMONT, FRANKLIN, GENEVA, GOTHENBURG, GRAND ISLAND, HARVARD, HASTINGS, HEBRON, HILDRETH, HOLDREGE, HOLLINGER, INAVALE, JOHNSON LAKE, KEARNEY, KENSINGTON, LEXINGTON, MINDEN, NELSON, ORLEANS, OSCEOLA, OXFORD, PHILLIPSBURG, POLK, RED CLOUD, ROSEMONT, SHELBY, SMITH CENTER, STROMSBURG, SUPERIOR, SUTTON, WILLOW ISLAND, AND YORK.
